title: Influence of humic acid and UV-irradiation on iron-based nanoparticle toxicity in Girardia tigrina
content:
Environ. Sci.: Nano, 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4EN00449C, Paper
Natasha Yadav, Anurag Nath, Pushplata Prasad Singh, Himadri B. Bohidar, Damien L. Callahan, Antoine M. Dujon, Luis O. B. Afonso, Aaron G. Schultz
The presence of humic acid and UV exposure influenced iron-based nanoparticle behaviour and toxicity to a freshwater planaria species.
